product_overview: Bingola is a modern, social bingo platform designed as a Progressive Web App (PWA) to provide synchronous multiplayer bingo gameplay with dynamic room management, integrated social interaction, and a virtual economy.
core_goals: Provide a synchronized multiplayer bingo experience accessible on mobile and desktop.
Enable Hosts to create and manage bingo rooms, control game flow, and approve players.
Integrate real-time chat, friend systems, and global leaderboards to foster social engagement.
Implement a virtual economy with BPoints and BCoins for rewards and store purchases.
Ensure performance, accessibility, and security for a seamless user experience.
key_features: User Authentication via Supabase Auth with email and password.
User profile customization including avatars, levels, point balances, and statistics.
Interactive tutorial for onboarding new users.
Host-driven room creation with customizable settings and player approval workflow.
Dynamic bingo card generation and marking with real-time synchronized number drawing and voice narration.
Victory celebration animations with sound effects for winners.
Real-time chat per room and global channels with emoji support.
Message center for system and friend notifications.
Friend system enabling quick invites and social connectivity.
Global ranking leaderboard based on BPoints.
Virtual Store for purchasing cosmetic items and boosters using BPoints and BCoins.
Master Hub admin panel for economic and subscription control.
Automatic logout after inactivity for security and resource optimization.
Persistent game state management preventing accidental round resets.
user_flow_summary: Player Flow: User launches app, completes login or registration, selects or enters a bingo room, waits in participant lobby until host starts the game, plays by marking numbers, and claims BINGO with victory celebrations and rewards.

Host Flow: User logs in, navigates to HostDashboard, creates and configures rooms with prize and rule settings, manages player entries via LobbyScreen, and controls the game flow during play including starting and pausing draws.
Social Interaction Flow: Users send messages in global and room chats, receive and manage friend invites and notifications via message center, and track rankings and profiles.
Economy Flow: Users earn and spend BPoints and BCoins in the Store, manage transactions, and customize visual themes and interface elements.
validation_criteria: Users must be able to register and login securely with Supabase Auth.
Hosts can create rooms with custom settings and approve/deny player entry effectively.
Bingo number drawing is synchronized across all clients in real-time with voice narration and celebration effects at victory.
Chat messages are delivered instantly in both global and room channels, with emoji and quick message support.
Store transactions update user balances correctly and items apply as expected.
Ranking leaderboard and profiles display correct and up-to-date player statistics.
The app responds within 3 seconds on initial load on supported devices.
Accessibility features such as voice narration for number draws are functional and reliable.
Automatic logout triggers after 10 minutes of inactivity to safeguard user data.
All game state synchronization ensures consistency preventing accidental resets or desynchronization.
